name: Ulit - Package for the website Lost in translations
body:
# (you) Lost in translations
> Note: The experiment - Lost in translations - has ended. It was fun while it lasted though. I will publish the translations that were recorded while it ran. Thanks for all who participated. 

Meanwhile, you can try this package if you want. Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
